ValidationRule.description: When a Request is completed, the Actual Deployment Date must be filled out (unless the Request Type is Question/Research. If there is no deployment date, the Status should be Cancelled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( request_status__c , "3. Completed"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Request_Type__c , "Question/Research")),ISNULL( date_release__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Actual Deployment Date is required before closing a Request as Completed. If the Request was not deployed to production, the Request Status should be Cancelled.
